name: Qisah Tomang: Cycle Ends
storyline:
For centuries An immortal demon named Tomang terrorize on the United Golden Dragon Empire. due to his immortality, each time he was slain he came back stronger leading to a cycle of terror and despair for the people

However, on one of the cycle while they were preparing for him, Tomang doesn’t appear. Believing the demon is gone, the people of the Empire celebrated their triumph and began to enjoy their peaceful life once more. However, the disappearance of Tomang resulted in the weakening of the Empire, with no common enemy to fight corruption and infighting run rampant in the empire. Little did they know a rising threat from the shadows, preparing the destruction of the empire.

Follow Zemi, a stiff man of ideal, B.W. a reckless carefree warrior and Aiq a vengeful demon hunter on their quest to save the empire and uncover the secret behind The Cycle of Hatred. Will they succeed or is it too late to save the empire and its people?
summary: Qisah Tomang: Cycle Ends is a story-rich RPG. The story is set in an East Asia inspired fantasy world. Fight off the Demon Tomang and its minion and discover the truth behind the Cycle of Hatred and put an end to it in this classic pixel RPG.
